summary: Core SPA flow, URL validation, preset selection UI, themed styling, and a conversion/history UX are implemented. However, the actual conversion/export does not produce an MP4 (it generates a JPEG), the results preview is an image rather than an in-browser video player, TikTok source retrieval is not implemented (explicitly described as a demo), and history deletion is only available for local entries (not synced/backend entries).

missing_requirements.requirement: Initiate retrieval of the source TikTok video for conversion after URL submission.
missing_requirements.reason: The conversion logic explicitly states it is a demo and does not retrieve TikTok video content; it generates a canvas image instead.

missing_requirements.requirement: Export a downloadable YouTube-ready MP4 file (download completes successfully).
missing_requirements.reason: The export hook creates a JPEG blob (canvas.toBlob with 'image/jpeg') and the filename ends with .jpg; comments indicate MP4 is not produced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Results screen previews the converted video in-browser (playable preview).
missing_requirements.reason: The results preview renders an element and describes it as a 'converted video frame' rather than using a

missing_requirements.requirement: Allow users to delete individual history entries from the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: Deletion UI appears only for non-backend entries; entries with ids starting with 'backend-' display 'Synced' and do not show delete actions. Backend actor also does not expose a delete method.
